docs.lead_paragraph: NEW YORK is slowly beginning to awake from the lethargy of the past six weeks. A fortnight more and at several of the watering places the season will have run its course. Autumn and Winter plans are now being discussed. The next general holiday in the beginning of September will bring the Newport Horse Show.
docs.abstract: Illus of Mr and Mrs Mackay with J B Widener, Saratoga, NY
